title: Re: bypass annoying registration on some pages
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]I'm pretty sure that's against the law. What if you have to pay money in order to register. This site would take you past it and that's just stealing.[hr][/quote]
And exactly who would pay for an account so that the people of the internet could visit sites for free? Besides, I'm sure that the site owners would disapprove of that sort of thing and remove paid-for accounts from the system if they were asked. It's not an attempt to defraud companies of money - it's simply a way of saving time for those who would rather not have hundreds of accounts. It's not illegal, so long as the users play by the rules.
